name: Delivery (NoelOskar)
description:
Delivery is 2d platformer and resource managing game at once. You play as a Delivery man, who's delivering necessery supplies to peapole durning virus outbreak. There are 10 unique endings, that depend on your actions and performance. Game features perma death, so if you die, your save dies too.

This game was created 1# Stay Safe! Jam

This was my first 48 H jam. and it's pretty hard to make a bigger game solo for this type of jam. I may comback to this concept in future, because currently game is too short, it would need more gameplay element,choices etc.

Controls:

A/D | Left/Right - Move

Space | W | Up - Jump

S | Down - Place Package

Credits
  • Game Design - NoelOskar
  • Scripts - NoelOskar
  • Art - NoelOskar
  • Sound - NoelOskar
  • Music - Nobody
